document.full_text: 'what are the forces at work that make us deny the big threats that stare us in the face'? margaret heffernan asks in her book, a look at how we may filter information for better or worse.
document.title: off the shelf: why red flags can go unnoticed
lines_and_colors: 'what are the forces at work that make us deny the big threats that stare us in the face'? margaret heffernan asks in her book, a look at how we may filter information for better or worse.
